module.name: reference_data_library
module.keywords: module, class, product, activity, document, organisation, person, library

purpose.P: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record:

UL.LI: a library of classes of product and their composition, connection, and containment relationships;
a library of classes of document and their composition relationships;
a library of classes of organization and their composition relationships;
a library of classes of person and their relationships with classes of organization.

LI.P: a library of classes of product and their composition, connection, and containment relationships;
a library of classes of document and their composition relationships;
a library of classes of organization and their composition relationships;
a library of classes of person and their relationships with classes of organization;
library identification for classes, supporting external references.
individual products, activities, documents, organizations and people;
